
test_c_create (pdm_t_part_to_block_ex1  1 PDM_LIST_TEST PDM_LIST_NRANK)
test_c_create (pdm_t_part_to_block_sol1 1 PDM_LIST_TEST PDM_LIST_NRANK)

test_c_create (pdm_t_part_to_block_ex2  1 PDM_LIST_TEST PDM_LIST_NRANK)
test_c_create (pdm_t_part_to_block_sol2 1 PDM_LIST_TEST PDM_LIST_NRANK)

set (PDM_LIST_TEST ${PDM_LIST_TEST} PARENT_SCOPE )
set (PDM_LIST_NRANK ${PDM_LIST_NRANK} PARENT_SCOPE )
